results.title: Ratiometric Detection of H2S in Liver Injury by Activated Two-Wavelength Photoacoustic Imaging.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is commonly used for clinical treatment of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type-2 diabetes@@@, but long-term or overdose intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ usually causes selective upregulation of @CHEMICAL_Hydrogen_Sulfide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006862 @@@H2S@@@ level in the liver, resulting in @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@.

results.title: [Voluntary self-poisoning with metformin and antiretroviral therapy drugs].
results.text_hl: This observation illustrates a rare case of voluntary intoxication with a high dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and its unusual association with antiretroviral therapy drugs, that could increase @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ and cause @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver failure@@@.
